trans-unit.source: Represents an editable content region within the design-time markup for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 表示关联控件的设计时标记内的可编辑内容区域。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class to help manage templates at design time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>类来帮助管理在设计时模板。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> will use an instance of this class with its <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method to generate HTML markup of the region's content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>将使用此类的实例及其<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>方法来生成 HTML 标记的区域的内容。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to create a control with two clickable regions and an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> object with two views, or templates.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何创建两个可单击区域的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>具有两个视图或模板对象。

trans-unit.source: Compile the project, then open the page in a visual designer and switch to design (WYSIWYG) view.
trans-unit.target: 编译该项目，然后在可视化设计器中打开页面，并切换到设计 (WYSIWYG) 视图。

trans-unit.source: There are two clickable views, **View1** and **View2**.
trans-unit.target: 有两个可单击视图，**视图 1**和**视图 2**。

trans-unit.source: Click **View1** and drag the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control from the lower part of the page into the empty designer region just below the clickable regions.
trans-unit.target: 单击**视图 1**并将其拖<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>从到空的设计器区域的可单击区域的正下方的页的下半部分的控件。

trans-unit.source: Click **View2** and drag the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButton> control into the empty designer region.
trans-unit.target: 单击**视图 2**并将其拖<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButton>到空的设计器区域的控件。

trans-unit.source: Click **View1** again, and the region with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> reappears.
trans-unit.target: 单击**视图 1**再次，和区域，其中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>随即再次出现。

trans-unit.source: Click **View2** and the region with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButton> reappears.
trans-unit.target: 单击**视图 2**和区域，其中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButton>随即再次出现。

trans-unit.source: Switch back to source view to see how your changes are persisted in the HTML markup
trans-unit.target: 切换回源视图，以查看所做的更改的 HTML 标记中持久保存的方式

trans-unit.source: Your project must have a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly.
trans-unit.target: 你的项目必须具有 System.Design.dll 程序集的引用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> object, or a designer that derives from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> 对象或一个从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> 派生的设计器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the region.
trans-unit.target: 区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> class using the given owner and name.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的所有者和名称初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> object, or a designer that derives from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> 对象或一个从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> 派生的设计器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the region.
trans-unit.target: 区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have the region accept only Web server controls for content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使区域只接受 Web 服务器控件作为内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> class using the given owner and name and the initial value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion.ServerControlsOnly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的所有者、名称和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 属性的初始值创建 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion.ServerControlsOnly" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTML markup for the content of the region.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区域内容的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: HTML markup representing the content of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: HTML 标记，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 对象的内容。

trans-unit.source: The control for which to get the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object for the current region.
trans-unit.target: 为其获取当前区域的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> 对象的控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object containing the design-time HTML markup for the given control.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> 对象，该对象包含给定控件的设计时 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the region can accept only Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示区域是否只能接受 Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the region can contain only Web server controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果区域只能包含 Web 服务器控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the region can be bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示区域是否可绑定到数据源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> content supports binding to a data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 内容支持绑定到数据源，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
